dcterms:description: RapidAI4EO is a satellite imagery corpus aimed at providing better monitoring of Land Use (LU), Land Cover (LC), and LULC change at a much higher level of detail and temporal frequency than is currently possible. It consists of Planet Fusion and Sentinel-2 imagery for selected European locations, covering 500,000 patches across the European Economic Area.
dcterms:title: RapidAI4EO
dcat:theme: Land Use and Land Cover Classification

dcterms:creator: Patrick Helber
Benjamin Bischke
Andreas Dengel
Damian Borth
dcterms:description: EuroSAT is a novel dataset and deep learning benchmark for land use and land cover classification, providing a comprehensive set of satellite images for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: EuroSAT
dcat:theme: Land Use and Land Cover Classification

dcterms:creator: Gencer Sumbul
Marcela Charfuelan
Begüm Demir
Volker Markl
dcterms:description: BigEarthNet is a large-scale benchmark archive for remote sensing image understanding, designed to facilitate the development and evaluation of algorithms for remote sensing tasks.
dcterms:title: BigEarthNet
